function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in labour market participation of immigrant men and women","Impact":"Potential increase in contact and interaction of individuals from diverse backgrounds, posing a risk of contagion and disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety guidelines, providing comprehensive training on infection control, and offering vaccinations","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, IoT-based occupancy monitoring, and air purification and filtration systems","People":"Immigrant men and women, native-born workers, and the general population","Owner":"Employers, government health agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Movement of refugees into platform or atypical employment, such as delivery services","Impact":"Greater exposure to public spaces, potential increase in contact with a larger population, and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Providing personal protective equipment, training on infection control, and access to healthcare services","Technologies":"Contactless delivery technology, wearable health monitoring devices, and remote health consultation platforms","People":"Refugees in atypical employment, customers, and the general population","Owner":"Employers, delivery platforms, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Initial increase in unemployment among refugees during the first lockdown in 2020","Impact":"Economic instability, limited access to healthcare, and increased vulnerability to health risks and diseases","Mitigation":"Economic support programs, access to affordable healthcare, and community outreach for mental health and well-being","Technologies":"Online job portals, digital financial assistance platforms, and telemedicine services","People":"Refugees, local communities, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, and healthcare institutions"}]}
